Hookah catering in Miami and all SoFlo

We’ll deliver the hookah, set it up and leave it to you for 24 hours.

Order service

What is it?

Our company offers all-inclusive hookah catering service for all kinds of events. We serve Miami, Fort Lauderdale, the Keys, Palm Beach and surrounding areas. Our hookah service is a perfect addition to any kind of Private parties, Social or Corporate/Business events.

We bring everything needed including the hookahs, tobacco, charcoal and mouthpieces to your event. Our hookah master remains onsite to service the hookahs for the duration of your party.

We do all the work, so you can relax, enjoying your party and clouds of smoke with our hookah!

How it works

Choose how many hookahs you need and fill out the form with your info

We call you back to confirm your order and then send you a quote with an online link to pay a deposit to book your date.

On the date of event we arrive one hour before event begins and set up our hookah station.

After the party, we wrap up and you pay the balance.

After the party, we wrap up and you pay the balance.

What you’ll get

Unlimited all-inclusive service

We provide unlimited refills of tobacco, unlimited tendering of charcoals, an unlimited supply of hygienic mout and an unlimited attention to your guests from our hookah experts.

Exotic
experience

For many people hookah is still a mystery from the Middle East. Having hookahs on your event will make impression on your guests.

Professionally made
hookahs

All of our hookah attendants have a big experience and know how to satisfy most sophisticated taste.

Beautiful
presentation

Not only our hookahs are highest quality, but also have a beautiful design. Each hookah is illuminated led light and in combination with real fruit head looks just awesome.
